Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationElementCollection Inherits ConfigurationElement Implements ICollection
public ref class ConfigurationElementCollection abstract : System::Configuration::ConfigurationElement, System::Collections::ICollection
type ConfigurationElementCollection = class inherit ConfigurationElement interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表包含子項目集合的設定項目。

span.span: Represents a configuration element containing a collection of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示組態檔內的項目集合。The represents a collection of elements within a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 組態檔內的項目是指基本的 XML 項目或一節。An element within a configuration file refers to a basic XML element or a section. 如果有的話，簡單的項目是與相關屬性的 XML 標記。A simple element is an XML tag with related attributes, if any. 簡單的項目構成一節。A simple element constitutes a section. 複雜的區段可以包含一或多個簡單的項目中，元素的集合，以及其他區段。Complex sections can contain one or more simple elements, a collection of elements, and other sections. 您使用若要使用的集合物件。You use the to work with a collection of objects. 實作這個類別，以新增自訂的集合項目。Implement this class to add collections of custom elements to a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . 第一個範例包含三個類別： `UrlsSection`，`UrlsCollection`和`UrlConfigElement`。`UrlsSection`類別會使用定義自訂組態區段。The first example consists of three classes: `UrlsSection`, `UrlsCollection` and `UrlConfigElement`.The `UrlsSection` class uses the to define a custom configuration section. 這個區段包含 URL 的集合 (所定義`UrlsCollection`類別) 的 URL 項目 (由`UrlConfigElement`類別)。This section contains a URL collection (defined by the `UrlsCollection` class) of URL elements (defined by the `UrlConfigElement` class). [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/cs/customcollectionsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/vb/customcollectionsection.vb#1)] 此第二個程式碼範例會使用前面所指定的類別。This second code example uses the classes specified before. 您結合這兩個範例中的主控台應用程式專案。You combine these two examples in a console application project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/cs/usingconfigurationcollectionelement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/vb/usingconfigurationcollectionelement.vb#31)] 當您執行主控台應用程式的執行個體`UrlsSection`類別建立與應用程式組態檔中產生下列的組態項目：When you run the console application, an instance of the `UrlsSection` class is created and the following configuration elements are generated in the application configuration file: ```xml

para.span: 您可以使用程式設計方式或宣告式 (attributed) 程式撰寫模型來建立自訂的組態項目。

span.span: You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element.

para.span: 程式設計模型需要針對每個項目屬性您建立的屬性來取得及設定其值，而且您將它新增至基礎的內部屬性包基底類別。

span.span: The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute you create a property to get and set its value, and that you add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.

para.span: 宣告式模型，也稱為屬性化的模型，可讓您藉由使用屬性並將其設定與屬性定義元素屬性。

span.span: The declarative model, also referred to as the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and configuring it with attributes.

para.span: 這些屬性會指示 ASP.NET 組態系統有關的屬性類型和其預設值。

span.span: These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.

para.span: ASP.NET 可以使用反映，來取得這項資訊再建立項目屬性的物件，並執行必要的初始化。

span.span: ASP.NET can use reflection to obtain this information and then create the element property objects and perform the required initialization.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來設定要使用的比較子。The is used to set a comparer to use. 例如，您可以使用不區分大小寫的比較子來產生索引鍵不區分大小寫。For example, you can use a case-insensitive comparer to make the key case insensitive.

summary.span: 取得或設定 的名稱，以在衍生類別中覆寫時，與 中的加入作業相關聯。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the to associate with the add operation in the when overridden in a derived class.
The name of the element.

exception.span: 選取的值以保留的前置詞 "config" 或 "lock" 當做開頭。

span.span: The selected value starts with the reserved prefix "config" or "lock".

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 加入 執行個體。

span.span: Adds a to an instance when overridden in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來加入新至集合。Use the method to add a new to the collection. 如果自訂行為時，務必在新增的項目，衍生類別中覆寫。Override in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is added. 新增項目時，只有在索引鍵完全相同而值不同時，才會將項目視為重複。When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different. 索引鍵和值都完全相同的項目是以無訊息模式接受，因為項目不會競爭。Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete. 但是不能新增具有完全相同索引鍵而不同值的項目，因為沒有邏輯可決定在兩個競爭的值當中應該接受哪一個。However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來加入新至集合。Use the method to add a new to the collection. 它覆寫衍生類別中新增項目時，如果自訂行為需要。Override it in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is added. 新增項目時，只有在索引鍵完全相同而值不同時，才會將項目視為重複。When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different. 索引鍵和值都完全相同的項目是以無訊息模式接受，因為項目不會競爭。Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete. 但是不能新增具有完全相同索引鍵而不同值的項目，因為沒有邏輯可決定在兩個競爭的值當中應該接受哪一個。However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以及如何從呼叫`Add`方法。The following code example shows how to override the method and how to call it from an `Add` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您新增重複的項目時，如果將擲回例外狀況元素的值是或。When you add a duplicate element, an exception is thrown if the value of the element is either or . 請注意，具有相同索引鍵和值的項目不被視為重複項目，並以無訊息方式接受。Note that elements with identical keys and values are not considered duplicates, and are accepted silently. 唯一的項目擁有相同的金鑰，但不同的值會被視為重複。Only elements with identical keys but different values are considered duplicates. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節方法。For more information, see the Remarks section for the method.
